content: notes as some of you might know i m not a native speaker so please be gentle and don t look to close for mistakes also keep in mind that this is my first pattern if you don t understand something feel free to contact me candyvansweet@email de www facebook com/candyvansweet candyvansweet this is a free pattern so don t sell it or claim it as your own and if you sell the cupcakes from this pattern i m absolutely fine with it don t worry but please share your finished items with me i d love to see your versions of this pattern at some point i will update this pattern and add some fruits or other stuff and it might not be free anymore follow me on facebook or instagram and i ll keep you updated about that until then have fun with this sweet little cupcakes and enjoy this pattern and by the way i m already working on the next pattern so stay tuned 1 materials ★ 3 mm crochet hook ★ yarn i used schachenmayr catania catania color and micro ​ ​​ ​ ​ ​ but you can use any yarn you want just remember to adjust the size of your hook ★ stuffing ★ needle ★ puff paint or safety eyes ★ if you re a loser when it comes to sewing like me than you also need a hot glue gun stitch abbreviations ★ slip_stitch slip_stitch ★ skip st skip stitch ★ chain chain ★ single_crochet single_crochet ★ half_double_crochet half_double_crochet ★ double_crochet double_crochet ★ increase increase ★ decrease decrease ★ blo back loops only ★ flo front loops only ★ hdc2tog half_double_crochet decrease 2 instructions cake 1 round 6 single_crochet in magic_ring join chain 1 6 2 round 2 single_crochet into each stitch join chain 1 12 3 round 2 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in next repeat around join chain 1 18 4 round 2 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in next 2 repeat around join chain 1 24 5 round 2 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in next 3 repeat around join chain 1 30 6 round 2 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in next 4 repeat around join chain 1 36 7 round blo 36 single_crochet around join chain 1 36 8 ­10 round make 36 single_crochet around join chain 1 36 11 round 2 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in next 5 repeat around join chain 1 42 12 ­13 round 42 single_crochet around join chain 1 42 14 round *skip st 4 half_double_crochet in next stitch skip st slip_stitch* repeat ** around join and fasten_off 3 frosting ch18 1 row skip first 2 stitches 2 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 13 stitches hdc2tog chain 2 turn 16 from now on blo except first and last stitch of each row 2 row hdc2tog 13 half_double_crochet 2hdc 3 row 2hdc 13 half_double_crochet hdc2tog 4 ­22 row repeat row 2+3 ending with 2 row with slip_stitch in blo attach row 1 to
